titles.title: A resolution designating June 2003, as "National Safety Month".
A resolution designating June 2003, as "National Safety Month".

action.text: Referred to the Committee on the Judiciary.
Committee on the Judiciary. Ordered to be reported without amendment favorably.
Committee on the Judiciary. Reported by Senator Hatch without amendment and with a preamble. Without written report.

calendar.text: Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 111.

vote.text: Resolution agreed to in Senate without amendment and with a preamble by Unanimous Consent.

bill.summary: (This measure has not been amended since it was introduced in the Senate on May 19, 2003. The summary of that version is repeated here.)Designates June 2003 as National Safety Month in recognition of the 90th anniversary of the founding of the National Safety Council and the 50th anniversary of the Council's congressional charter.
